title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Against Hezbollah Targets in South Lebanon: Detailed Coverage of Today’s Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Throughout the day, IDF forces attacked terror targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in South Lebanon.

Earlier today, Air Force fighter jets attacked a military building of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Tir Harfa area.

During the day, IDF forces carried out firing to remove threats using artillery in the areas of A-Nkoura, Marwahin, Hanin, and Al-Matmura. In addition, a tank fired at a military building in the Kfar Kila area where terrorist activity was identified.

Earlier today, a rocket launch was identified to the Shetula area, in addition to two rocket launches to the Hermon area. IDF forces attacked the source of the fire.

Attached is documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/4a03h9y

In addition, a tank fired at a military building in the Kfar Kila area where terrorist activity was identified. Earlier today, a rocket launch was identified to the Shetula area, in addition to two rocket launches to the Hermon area.
